title: Wood-Look Flooring*, Fireplace*, Balcony or Patio
posting_body: ['$1000 Off your Move in if you move in within 2 weeks!', 'Welcome home to The Richfield Apartments, where you will discover spacious and modern one, two, and three bedroom Aurora apartments.', 'Newly renovated interiors combined with upscale resident amenities bring you the community you have been looking for.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 90', 'OR Text', '90', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 930 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Loft Layouts*', '- Newly Renovated Interiors', '- Wood-Look Flooring*', '- Fireplace*', '- Washer & Dryer Connections', '- Oversized Closets', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Balcony or Patio', '*', 'In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Two Sparkling Pools', '- Playground', '- On-Site Management', '- On-Call Courtesy Patrol', '- Fitness Center', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- Courtesy Package Acceptance', '- Covered Parking Options', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 X the Monthly rent for applicants', '4 times the rent for guarantors', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Richfield Apartments', '2134 S Richfield Wy, Aurora, CO, 80013', 'Ef1V5JaNhG']
